content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for considering my apartment. I expect the rental price to be fair and reasonable, based on the size and location of the apartment. What do you have in mind for the monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to accept the rental price of x Euro, but could you please specify the rent you expect?

I am also willing to negotiate, but I want to make sure that the rental price is fair and reasonable based on the size and location of the apartment.
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment. Based on the location and size of the apartment, I would expect a monthly rental price of at least 900 Euros. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to consider a higher rent if it reflects the true value of the apartment. What do you think would be a fair rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would be willing to agree to a rental price of 850 Euros per month.

I would also like to know if there are any additional costs that I should be aware of, such as utilities or maintenance fees.

Thank you for your time and consideration.
name: Bo Li

content: Thank you for your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and agree to a rental price of 850 Euros per month. In addition to the monthly rental, there will be a one-time security deposit of 200 Euros, which will be returned to you at the end of the lease term. There will also be a monthly maintenance fee of 50 Euros, which covers basic cleaning and repairs. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
